storyInfo: Xiaohei is unlucky to be separated from Xiaobai and Ah Gen after landing in Lungmen. Staying at Hung's for the time being, he takes on an assignment to search for a lost pet.

attributes.content: It's been raining the entire day, and though it's stopped by evening, the air is still somewhat damp.
Gloomy clouds gather, forming a pitiless wall through the sky. The glistening moonlight finds nowhere to spill down, and the light from the surface nowhere to shine up.

attributes.name: Xiaohei
attributes.content: I'm sick of this weather.

attributes.name: Xiaohei
attributes.content: Achoo—!
I just wanted to take a nap up here. This sucks. The roof's all wet.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: *sniff* *sniff* Hmm? This box here's still dry inside.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Climbs into box)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Aha... getting some sleep in this weather has its own charm though.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Big sale on fresh produce today! Don't miss our Buy One Get One Free special! The lowest prices in downtown Lungmen, as thanks to our loyal customers!
attributes.name: Downstairs Commercial

attributes.content: (Turns to the left) Hiss—
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I've told you a billion times! Stop wasting time after dinner and do your homework! You never see any other Perro taking it as slow as you do!
attributes.name: Downstairs Neighbor

attributes.content: (Turns to the right) Grrr—
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: With the forecast being humid in the coming days, we remind all citizens to follow fire safety rules. High humidity can easily lead to electrical fires. Be careful around live currents, and inspect household devices regularly!
attributes.name: Downstairs TV

attributes.content: (Springs up) Just shut up! You can't speak that fast and expect people to understand you!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: He lies back down in the box, beneath an overcast night sky, all manner of sounds filtering through his ears, but never what he's hoping to hear.
Xiaobai...  Ah Gen... where are you right now?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Xiaohei? Are you up on the roof? It's dinnertime! You'll catch a cold up there—it just rained today! Come down!
(Roughly rubs eyes)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Alright! I'll be down in a moment!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I'll lay the table for you, Hung. How many are eating tonight?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: No need, Waai Fu set everything out already.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Then is there anything else I can help with?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Come here, you're all wet!
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: You were on the roof again, weren't you, Xiaohei? No wonder I couldn't find you anywhere. Aak, bring Xiaohei a clean towel, quick!
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Here, punk, catch. Yeah, don't thank me!
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Hmph, like I ever would!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Alright, alright, settle down. Wipe your hair off and let's have dinner.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Come on, Xiaohei! I'm putting this giant rib in your bowl. Felines your age are in the middle of your growth spurt, so you can't skimp on nutrition.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Ah, Waai Fu, let me get the door. I'll be right there.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Well, well, fancy seeing you here, Xiaohei.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Haha, I could smell it from the hallway. We've got steamed ribs tonight, don't we?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Yup, Hung went to the market early this morning to wait in line for them.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hmph! You've got a sharp nose, Uncle Lee, but unfortunately so do I. Fess up, what's that bottle you're hiding behind you?!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Yeah, hand it over and no one gets hurt.
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: *sigh*. I was passing by the Syuns' wineshop after a job well done. Old Syun pushed four tael of huangjiu onto me as thanks, and you know how stubborn he is. Had to take it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Let me be absolutely clear, I did not go and buy this myself.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Well, I, for one, am thankful to Mr. Syun. I just used up the last of my cooking wine today, so this is just perfect. Xiaohei, could you put that bottle in the cupboard under the kitchen counter for me?
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Got it, Hung.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hey! I see what you did there, Mr. Well-Behaved! I didn't even get to drink any yet! And you, fluffball, what're you playing along with him for?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hahaha, nice work, Xiaohei!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Pffff. Aren't you a lively little rascal when you're all fed? Not bad, I like it. Good kids take their meals seriously.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (Puts head down and eats)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: That reminds me, er, Xiaohei...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (Puts down bowl)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Did you find anything out, Mr. Lee?!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Er, concerning your inquiry, nothing's on the horizon as of yet...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Oh, I see...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Whisper) Boss, why are you bringing this up at the dinner table?!
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Look, Xiaohei. Actually, I've got another little thing I was hoping you could pitch in for. Would you be willing to help a detective out here?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Go ahead, Mr. Lee! I'm listening!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: So here's the deal. The Yuans' daughter lost a pet, found herself at a loss, and eventually left the task to me. After a bit of nosing around, I've got some reports of sightings at the eatery street on Naam Ping Bay.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But I'm all tied up with work lately, and just can't get around to it. So I'm wondering if you could go take a look for me? Would you mind?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No problem, just leave it to me.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Good. Here's a photo of the pet. Don't lose it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Wha-What kind of animal is this? I've never seen it before...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Never? Well, that's strange.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's a cloudbeast. Rich or poor, everyone here loves keeping one around the house.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Can I take a look, Xiaohei? Let me see... All black... a storm cloudbeast. You don't see coats that color every day.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Storm?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Because it's dark like a storm cloud. That's how we distinguish them in Yan. There're a lot of cloudbeast owners, so we ended up telling them apart by color.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: White ones are snow cloudbeasts, red ones are sunset cloudbeasts, and there are some multicolored ones too, with their own special names.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Ohh. Okay, I see. I think I understand.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: So you said you'd never seen one before? Did nobody keep any, back where you're from?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No, um! It's just, the ones I've seen are—are—it's not coming to me right now.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Oh—
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Mr. Lee, Hung, I'm done eating. I'll be going to bed for now.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hey, why the hurry to run away? Remember, early day tomorrow. I'll take you to Naam Ping Bay.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: What, what's with that face, Hung?!
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Boss... what are you thinking, asking our guest to do our jobs for us?
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: *sigh* More hands make lighter work.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Boss!
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Enough. Are you trying to make me feel ashamed?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Let me ask you. The boy was up on the roof again, wasn't he?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: ...He was. How'd you know, Boss?
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Caught a little of that damp smell from him just as I came in, and it's not like it's been raining indoors.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We may not have known each other long, but I can tell. He always escapes to the roof to get away from people whenever something's weighing on him. On one hand, I imagine he misses his friends too much, can't get over it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And on the other, he's cooped up in your place all day with nothing to do. He's too restless to just sit there.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But he's still a kid. Leave him out of work.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Heheh. He's a kid, and yet he isn't. Hung, have you ever fought him?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What, are you saying the boy knows kung fu?!
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Exactly, and he's good enough to go toe-to-toe with any adult. He was so nerve-wracked when I first found him, he threw some moves out at me. Bold, feisty ones.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's not exactly common. What kind of place would raise children like that?
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Heh, good question. I'd like to find out too.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Greetings to all tourists. Please remain behind the one-meter line. Form an orderly queue as you come through, and avoid blocking traffic. The current time is 2:45 in the morning. Lungmen welcomes your arrival.
attributes.name: PA

attributes.content: This is Lungmen, then? They've got all these lights on in the dead of night, it's a marvel. Scampering all our way out here's been worth it.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Is this your first time here too, Rockrock?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yep. The style of this place feels nothing like at home.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Do you think something's special about it?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It's really... youthful here, I think, really lively.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: It feels unreal, seeing so many bustling about through the gates. Almost like... like that disaster a few years back never left a mark.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I think... the city's simply able to heal itself. Just like people.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: True. It was hard-hit, but in a city as hearty as this, you only need to blink and there's new blood again.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Only question is, even with no scars on the surface, what about the wounds within?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I think... it'll be fine. People have short memories.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: *sigh*... Don't listen to anyone who tells you that. Memories don't disappear just 'cause you say they do. What happens is time passes, and people don't want to bring them up anymore.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Mhm, I know. Grown-ups all have things they don't want to talk about. They shut it all up inside them and let it slowly digest.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You've... got a little too much wisdom in you, I think.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock, wait for us!
(Ah Gen, this place is so magical! I've never seen a city that could move before!)
(Haha, you're right. I never thought I'd see the day when a city could migrate like an animal.)
Xiaobai! Ah Gen! Where have you been? We're almost at the front of the line! Do you still have all the papers I got for you?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Sorry to keep you hanging for so long. Xiaobai needed to go to the bathroom, and it took forever for us to find the right place.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Biu!
attributes.name: Biu

attributes.content: This place is too crowded! Just now, I even ran into—
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Let's save it for later. Quick, we need to get in line.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What did you run into?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: It couldn't be something dangerous, could it?!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No, not at all. No need to worry, you two.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Ah Gen, I know you're a kid who never gets flustered, and your Originium Arts are plenty strong enough to protect you and Xiaobai. Yes, we don't need to worry for you.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But if you're not even willing to tell us about the danger you run into, that'll only make us more worried.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: We already really appreciate that you were okay with paying for our trip, Rockrock.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Let alone the fact that we were lucky enough for you to rescue us in the first place. I couldn't have gotten us away from those ferocious 'tunepincers' no matter what.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Tune-pincers?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You're messing it up again. They're called 'gloompincers.'
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Haha, silly me. Anyway, we've already given you so much trouble on the way. We really are sorry if we made you worry any more than that.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Well, then do you have anywhere to live once you're in Lungmen?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Um... not yet.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I guessed you'd have a hell of a time looking. Come stay at the Rhodes Island branch office for the first while, then.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I... I guess we'll have to take you up on that offer. If there's anything we can help with, no matter what, just say the word.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Oh, come on, honestly. We've been along the entire way together. You can afford to be a little less polite with us than that.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: That's right, Mr. Ah Gen. And we're not even on a very demanding mission this time. We're mostly in charge of escorting some local patients to the landship for treatment.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I bet you're wondering, seeing as Suzuran's so young, but she joined up before I did. As old hands go in this company, she gets amazing work done.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rhodes Island really is an incredible place. Heading anywhere and everywhere, just to rescue the sick and dying...
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Yeah! I'm scared of getting shots at the hospital, but even I know how hard all the doctors and nurses there are working.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: That's not the only thing we do, either. There's some other... huh? Looks like it's our turn. Oh well, you'll find out soon enough once we get to the branch office.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yup. Xiaobai, Ah Gen, let's go.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Fie! Where did all these L.G.D. people well up from?
attributes.name: Victorian Merchant

attributes.content: Didn't you see it on the way in? Someone used Arts to freeze some border-hopping fugitive to a railing.
attributes.name: Bolívarian Tourist

attributes.content: What?! You're joking!
attributes.name: Victorian Merchant

attributes.content: Can it, huevón. You're up at the gate. Get going.
attributes.name: Bolívarian Tourist

attributes.content: Eh? Oh... very well, very well. Tsk, how out of the ordinary.
attributes.name: Victorian Merchant

attributes.content: So is this where Rockrock's company works, Ah Gen? That man has stones growing out of his stomach. I bet that hurts...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Don't stare at people's illnesses. It's impolite.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Ah! I'm sorry, Mister, I didn't mean to.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Haha, it's alright, kid. We've gotten plenty of funny looks in our time. We know you don't mean bad.
attributes.name: Patient

attributes.content: Excuse me, do you know, um, where we can find Operator Rockrock?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Sure, just inside Xiaoyuan's ward. Keep going straight ahead, then turn left and you'll be right there.
attributes.name: Patient

attributes.content: Thank you, Mister.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Bye! I hope you get better soon.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Uh, better?! Hahahaha, thank you, kid, I, uh, appreciate the kindness...
attributes.name: Patient

attributes.content: (Did I say something wrong? That man was really forcing his laugh.)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Shakes head) Let's just go find Rockrock and Suzuran for now.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Miss, I'm not going to the landship. I'm still super fine. Let me stay here, pleaaase.
Listen now, Xiaoyuan. The office doesn't have the resources to cope with the current state of your illness anymore. We can only get a good hold of your condition once we transfer you to the landship.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: There are a lot of patients your age on the landship, Miss Xiaoyuan. You'll get to meet lots of new friends there if you go.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I... I'll wait until my Sixty-Seven's back. I want to go with him, *whimper*...
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Sixty-Seven?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Sixty-Seven ran off. I can't leave on my own. I—I want to wait for him.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Ah Ping, have we ever had any patients go missing here?!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: No, Sixty-Seven's her pet. It went missing last year, and she's been obsessing over it ever since, searching the whole time.
attributes.name: Office Operator

attributes.content: Let me stay here, Miss. Please, pretty please? Just give me a bit more time, I know I can find him... *whimper*
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Oh, Xiaoyuan, let's not cry now. Wipe your tears away.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: We sent people out looking, but Lungmen's a big place, and it was never going to be easy finding a single pet. Plus, we're always short on staff. We couldn't keep it up for long.
attributes.name: Office Operator

attributes.content: Well, what do we do? We're not going to drag her back with us.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: (Bawling)
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Don't! I don't wanna leave! Don't take me away!
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Um, how about we help search too?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But we don't have many hands to spare as is... and there's other patients set up for landship treatment that we need to transfer.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Besides, we have to head back next week on the dot, or else we'll be holding a lot of people back from getting help.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: What do we do...? We don't have any other options.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Ah Gen, can we go and help search?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I'm not sure about that. We don't know this place at all.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Do you really want to?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I just think that... Miss Rockrock's helped us out so much, I want to help her out too.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Yeah, it's about time we returned the favor. Let's see what we can wrangle, then.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Rockrock, would you be okay with letting me and Xiaobai help with the search?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You lot...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Please, let us give it a shot.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Ah Gen's amazing. It'll be okay.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Rockrock, are you here? There's a small malfunction with the imaging equipment in the consulting room. Could we ask you to come take a look at it?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Hold on, I'll be right there!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: ...Alright, then. But if you run into any trouble, notify me right away.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Okay, we'll be sure to.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Hello, Xiaoyuan. I'm Ah Gen, and this is my cousin Xiaobai.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Continued sobbing)
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Xiaoyuan, just calm down. Listen to me, okay?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Don't feel too down... We'll help you out!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry. I—I'm being really selfish, everyone's been looking for so long even though they're so busy. I shouldn't be asking you too.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: No, it's okay. None of us would want to part with our friends.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Yeah. So we'll help you as much as we can.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: R—Really?! This is a photo of him, he's really cute and friendly, he's gotta be hiding somewhere.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: We'll take good care of this photo and do everything we can to find him for you, but I want to be clear. There's a chance... it might not turn out like you're hoping.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: That's right, Xiaoyuan. Parting's one of those things in life you can't avoid. No matter what, you have to chin up and be brave, and you can never let it hurt you, okay?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: (Sobbing) Mm-hm, one more, just one last try. If I can't find him, I... I'll stop looking, I'll listen... I'll go to the landship with you.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: And that's that. Xiaobai and I will head out tomorrow to ask around.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I appreciate it. Get some rest for today. I'm popping out for now.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Just settle down.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mrrraah!
Stop struggling!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Sshaaa!
(Picks up)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mrew—
Mr. Lee, it's me, Xiaohei. I caught the storm cloudbeast, I'll be back at the agency in a moment.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: She already found her pet?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: But... hmm, okay. I'm coming back now.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: That's weird. Where'd you come from, then? You look just like the picture.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: The storm cloudbeast fidgets uncomfortably as it's lifted by the scruff of its neck, lashing out to try and escape from Xiaohei's grasp, but at the same time baring its own bony ribs at him.
You sure haven't eaten properly in forever. Hmm... let's take you back for now and get you a proper meal.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: This street's so busy! Are we starting the search from here?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Yeah. We should find plenty of stray critters with all these eateries. Food's abundant here. It's easy to find meals.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: But can animals eat human food?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: It's not good for them, but it's not like they know that. All they care about is not starving.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: ...I hope Xiaohei isn't starving here.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: He wouldn't. He can take care of himself.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Don't let your imagination run wild. I bet you're hungry too, being out this early. Look, Rockrock slipped us a good handful of the local money after we passed border inspection, so let's go find something to eat for now.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Two cups of soya milk to go, please. Thanks.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Here, careful.
attributes.name: Stall Vendor A

attributes.content: Hey, there are a lot of stray animals around here, right?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Yep. All up and down the street every day, absolutely filthy. They're nightmares.
attributes.name: Stall Vendor A

attributes.content: Have you seen a black-colored cloudbeast recently, then?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Don't remember. Not the sort of thing you pay attention to when you're busy all day.
attributes.name: Stall Vendor A

attributes.content: Exactly. Who knows what germs and parasites those things might be carrying? We're already being kind enough not killing the damn things.
attributes.name: Stall Vendor B

attributes.content: (Clutching onto Ah Gen's jacket) Killing...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: What the hell's wrong with you, saying that to a child?!
attributes.name: Stall Vendor A

attributes.content: It's fine. Come on, Xiaobai, let's go ask someone else.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Limited time discount on freshly squeezed fruit juice! 20% off! You know you want it, so come get some!
attributes.name: Stall Vendor C

attributes.content: Excuse me, have you seen a black-colored cloudbeast recently?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Nope, nope. Kid, if you're not buying, quit standing there. This is my business.
attributes.name: Stall Vendor C

attributes.content: I'm sorry. How much is the juice?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: 120 LMD for a pitcher.
attributes.name: Stall Vendor C

attributes.content: Erk... that's kind of expensive.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Forget it, Ah Gen. Let's go ask the next person.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Steamed buns, instant steamed buns! Every filling you can think of right here!
attributes.name: Stall Vendor D

attributes.content: Hello, have you seen a storm cloudbeast anywhere?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Haven't seen one, little miss. Better ask somewhere else.
attributes.name: Stall Vendor D

attributes.content: Ah... sorry to bother you.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Cheer up, Xiaobai. Let's keep asking around.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: There's a rescue shelter near the slums, though. The one running it picks up the local strays all the time. Might be worth looking there?
attributes.name: Stall Vendor D

attributes.content: Really? That's great!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Now I mention it, though, I haven't seen 'em around for a while. Weird.
attributes.name: Stall Vendor D

attributes.content: How much for a bun? We'd like two with fresh meat, please!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Haha, that's 7 LMD in total. Thanks for your business.
attributes.name: Stall Vendor D

attributes.content: Hey, how come you're only eating the outside of your bun?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I'm leaving some in case there are any hungry animals in the street.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Hahaha, I see! Let me go back and buy another one, then. Finish that one you're holding, alright?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: It's okay, Ah Gen. We shouldn't spend too much. We'll need it to keep looking for Sixty-Seven.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Alright, then.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: The more we save, the more food we can buy Xiaohei when we find him! He might be hungry right now.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Achoo—weird, don't know where that sneeze came from...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Thrashing about)
Alright, let's go. I had to skip breakfast this morning just to catch you, you know.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Maybe he got luckier than us, and he's off eating good food as we speak!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Looks like it's almost noon. I bet Hung's got lunch ready.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: That would be wonderful!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I really want to find him soon.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I wonder where Xiaobai and Ah Gen are right now...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I'm sure he's looking for us too.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: When are we going to see each other again?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mm-hm! I hope we see each other before long!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Okay, enough worrying! We'll meet again, no doubt about it!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Peeping to and fro)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: (Searching all over)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: What are you looking for?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mrrraah!
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Don't be scared, I'm the one who brought you back. This is just another form of mine.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: If you're looking for a way out, there's a fire escape you can climb down on the side.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Uneasily swaying tail) Mrehhh...
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: It's kind of weird, though. I'm from a different world and I can still more or less understand you.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: But why leave? What's wrong with staying here? Mr. Lee might call you a headache, but you can tell he's still willing to take you in.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Shaking head) Mrow.
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: There's not enough to eat out there, and you'll have people chasing your hide. What is it that makes you want to go back so much?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mreeh... mreh...
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: So... you're looking for someone too.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: C'mere. I'm not gonna hurt you.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Lies down)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: I'll help you. We'll find them, together.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Lifts head)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: ...Ever since I got here, I haven't dared tell anyone I'm not actually from this world.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I had a wonderful master, and wonderful friends, back where I came from.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Two months ago, I was chasing two strange beasts in the forest—oh, they call them Originium slugs here. Who knows how they showed up there?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Ah Gen said we should split up and pursue them, and I spent ages chasing that slug by myself, but when I glanced back, I couldn't even see the way I came.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Then I stepped onto thin air, and kept falling and falling through this white light...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: And when I opened my eyes, I was here.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I don't even know if Xiaobai and Ah Gen ended up here too. I want to see them, but I don't want to find them in this world.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Shakes ears) Mrow?
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: It's too dangerous here. Maybe me and Ah Gen can protect ourselves, but Xiaobai... And there's a disease spreading around too, that makes you grow scary rocks... I hope they have somewhere safe to stay.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Lifts a foot out to place on Xiaohei's back)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Are you trying to comfort me?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mreeh!
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: ...Thanks.
attributes.name: Xiaohei
